title: Theme Bazaar Pro MUI Integration With PayloadCMS
description: Developed a custom integration of PayloadCMS with the Barzaar Pro theme to enable fully dynamic layouts and content management. This project highlights my ability to transform static templates into scalable, CMS-driven solutions for real-world e-commerce use cases.

title: Waqar Law Porfolio Website With PayloadCMS for Dynamic Content and Records Management
description: Integrated PayloadCMS with a custom frontend to enable dynamic content and records management, along with Cloudinary for media storage. Deployed on Vercel with MongoDB integration, showcasing expertise in full-stack CMS-driven solutions and scalable deployments.

title: Innovate Consults Portfolio Website
description: Created and integrated PayloadCMS to power dynamic content with role-based access control and Cloudinary for media storage. Deployed on Vercel with MongoDB database integration, ensuring a secure, scalable, and CMS-driven solution..
